name: AI Diagnosis
explanation: Our AI diagnosis system uses advanced machine learning algorithms trained on millions of medical cases to provide accurate preliminary diagnoses.

name: Health Monitoring
explanation: Real-time health monitoring system that tracks vital signs and alerts healthcare providers of any concerning changes.

name: Telemedicine
explanation: Secure video consultations with licensed healthcare professionals available 24/7.

name: Data Security
explanation: HIPAA-compliant platform with end-to-end encryption ensuring complete privacy of patient data.
